channel.title: Revival-RS 667/688 Highly Detailed, Every Feature is perfected!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://revival-rs.biz/mybb/logo.png[/img]
Hello people, as you maybe know Revival-RS from the remake of 317. Now it's time to bring it back as 667/688
This is still really basic, and needs loads of work. Beta will be online in 3-4 weeks.
need of Web developer
[B]Server programmer[/B]: Ahridok [B]Web Developer[/B]: [I]NONE
[/I]Website: [URL=http://"http://www.revival-rs.biz"]Revival-RS :: SLEEP, PLAY, EAT[/URL] (needs loads of work as well really basic!)
Features
Basic cleaned out 667 features, login, basic PvP.
[B]Media
[/B][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oJouXPT.png[/img]
[/CENTER]
[ul][*]Added basic Grand Exchange [*]Added Dwarf Battlefield Dungeon [*]Casket System gives GP/Random items [*]Auto Donation System [*]Worked on forums a a lot today. 30/12 [*]Fixed few exploits [*]Now using Joris released Cache! (Thanks!) [*]Barrows [*]Charater Design [*]Pets[/ul]
[CENTER]
[/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=6]MEDIA
[/SIZE][SPOILER=Media][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bSQxEhH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3pCAQvb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N6r5YSP.jpg[/img] [URL=http://"http://i.imgur.com/JeOBO8D.png"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JeOBO8D.png[/img][/URL] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oJouXPT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eQ1w8O0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rHG1U7n.png[/img][/SPOILER][/CENTER]

item.description:
@Ahridok wrote:

Cheers mate!

@Update near perfect wooducutting skill.

Added very basic achievement system to skills.

@Fletching Skill Near 100%
